mapper.select: select s.sys_no as "sysNo", u.user_nm as "managerNm", sys_nm as "sysNm", sys_updt_date as "sysUpdtDate" from system s, user_system us, users u where s.sys_no = us.sys_no and u.user_no = s.manager_no and us.cust_no = #{userNo}

SELECT stts.STTS_NO AS "sttsNo", stts_NM AS "sttsNm", COUNT(SR_NO) AS "count" FROM SR sr, SR_STTS stts WHERE sr.stts_no = stts.stts_no AND SYS_NO = #{sysNo} GROUP BY stts.STTS_NO, STTS_NM ORDER BY stts.STTS_NO ASC

SELECT stts.STTS_NO AS "sttsNo", stts_NM AS "sttsNm", COUNT(SR.SR_NO) AS "count" FROM SR sr, SR_STTS stts, HR hr WHERE sr.stts_no = stts.stts_no AND sr.sr_no = hr.sr_no AND USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY stts.STTS_NO, STTS_NM ORDER BY stts.STTS_NO ASC
select s.sys_no as "sysNo", u.user_nm as "managerNm", sys_nm as "sysNm", sys_updt_date as "sysUpdtDate" from system s, users u WHERE s.manager_no = u.user_no AND u.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT SR_NO AS "srNo", SR_TTL AS "srTtl", SR_STD AS "srStd", SYS_NM AS "sysNm", STTS_NM AS "sttsNm", USER_DP_NM AS "userDpNm", USER_NM AS "requesterNm", SR_REG_DATE AS "srRegDate", SR_DDLN_DATE AS "srDdlnDate", SR_CN AS "srCn", SR_PRY "srPry", SR_BGT "srBgt" FROM SR sr,SYSTEM system, SR_STTS stts, USERS users WHERE sr.sys_no = system.sys_no AND sr.stts_no = stts.stts_no AND sr.sr_cust_no = users.user_no AND sr_no = #{srNo}
